note.p: Education: Emmanuel College, Cambridge. MD (Lit Reg 1725)
Career: Practised as a surgeon in London, realising a large fortune; then turned to the practice of medicine; acquired substantial estates in Essex
Memberships: Company of Barber Surgeons (disfranchised 1724); LRCP (1724); FRCP (1726)
Notes: Details of career in Venn attached to another John Bamber probably belong to this one. Died at the age of 86 (MI printed in Munk)
